ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Sider Silks & Tailoring (Silk Swatch)
ygData.msgSnippet: you get a sewing kit you put two spider silks in it you hit combine depending on your level of tailor sometimes you make silk swatch, sometimes you dont but it
ygData.messageBody:
you get a sewing kit
you put two spider silks in it
you hit combine
depending on your level of tailor
sometimes you make silk swatch, sometimes you dont
but it wont take long for it to be trivial

and you thought all those spiders were just a nuisance

also spiderling silks in same process makes silk thread

if your going to farm them i recommend having a poison resistance up

have fun

nomad
aka nomiea winter wolf [ancient fellowship] 43 druid
aka nepher dark elf shadow knight
xev server
all hail xev...that is when its up




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
